title: Monster No Niku Wo Kutte Itara Oui No Tsuita Ken
alternative_title: Monster no Niku o Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken; モンスターの肉を食っていたら王位に就いた件; I Took The Throne After Eating Monster Meat; EAT or DIE; Monster no Niku wo Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken
status: Monster no Niku o Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken; モンスターの肉を食っていたら王位に就いた件; I Took The Throne After Eating Monster Meat; EAT or DIE; Monster no Niku wo Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken
description:
Description :
        about a prince who fears to get assassinated so he refuses to eat anything prepared in his castle. Instead he ventures out to eat the creatures he hunted himself. Even though they taste horrible, they unknowingly let him absorb their powers. Then he encounters a sword-wielding beauty who knows the potential of eating monster meat and reluctantly becomes her disciple. The path to great power lies in eating monster meat!
